CustomField.description: Conditionally show the "Import Offline Document" custom link if the status category is not "In Effect" or "Expired" or "Terminated" or "Amended" or "Cancelled"
CustomField.formula: IF (NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Effect"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Expired"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Terminated"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Amended"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Cancelled"))), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__OfflineDocumentImport?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_ImportOfflineDocument", "Import Offline Document"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Import Offline Document
